name: AS_CO_UT_returnApplicationVersionComponents
description: Given an application version in the format `MAJOR`.`MINOR`.`PATCH`, returns a dictionary with those keys and their values.  PATCH is optional and will default to 0, but major and minor version are required.
sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!components: tointeger(split(ri!version, ".")),
  'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:CO}AS_CO_ApplicationVersion'(
    major: local!components[1],
    minor: local!components[2],
    patch: index(
      local!components,
      3,
      0,
    )
  )
)
